I'm proficient in building scalable, high-performance web applications using modern technologies.
about.paragraph2: I'm passionate about <0>clean code</0>, <1>best practices</1>, and <2>seamless user experiences</2>. I specialize in transforming Figma UI designs into highly accurate, pixel-perfect and responsive frontend implementations. I work with distributed systems, microservices architecture, and modern DevOps tools to deliver production-ready applications.

I believe in writing code that's not just functional, but <0>maintainable, testable, and scalable</0>.
